show

public static int show(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell parent,
                       java.lang.String message,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       int type)
Shows the messagebox on the screen.

Parameters:
parent - Parent shell of this message box
message - message to display in the messagebox's content
title - messagebox's title
type - messagebox's type (Info, warning, error ...)
Returns:
integer representing the answer to the messagebox
